client.interfaces

Interface ClientDisplayerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientDisplayer

    public interface ClientDisplayerInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    Remote Objects interface to display the client displayers from the forum server.
    Author:
    Grumpy Group
